synopsis.text:
Yuki Mizuho and Kamiyama Miko, two inseparable high school friends, find their bond tested when they both develop feelings for the same guy, Nagase Tohru. Tohru, a charismatic classmate, is temporarily staying at Mizuho's residence, complicating matters further. As Miko, who hails from a conservative family, struggles to express her affection for Tohru, she seeks Mizuho's assistance, unaware of her friend's growing fondness for him.

Adding to this tangled web of emotions is Ai Minamizato, a younger student who also harbors feelings for Tohru. As Tohru navigates through this maze of love and friendship, he must make a decision that could potentially alter the dynamics of their relationships forever. Will he follow his heart or take the path of least resistance? Only time will tell in this emotional rollercoaster filled with teenage drama, budding romance, and a dash of humor.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
